feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/11/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [SBG3 ][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S350A04

Oct 19, 22:44 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - End of Life Real Time Monitoring APIv6
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 7, 09:30 - 10:00 UTC

Sep 22, 11:30 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 07/11/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : The End of Life of Real Time Monitoring (RTM) for baremetal is scheduled for the 7th of November 2023.
Few customers will be impacted (less than 10) and will stop be able to monitor their dedicated servers via the APIv6. This will impact APIv6 calls /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/statistics.

entry.title: [BHS][Dedicated Servers] - Network Perturbation Incident Notification
entry.content:
Oct 21, 15:23 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented by our technical teams to fix the network perturbations.
Since 14:24 UTC no more network perturbations present.
Our teams are monitoring the situation

Oct 21, 14:00 UTC
Update - Our teams are still working on fixing the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Oct 21, 10:19 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 21/10/2023 09:14 UTC
Service impact : We are experiencing some degradation on servers in BHS.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0301A04A
entry.content:
Oct 20, 21:53 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 20/10/2023 20:28 UTC
End time : 20/10/2023 21:26 UTC
Service status : Services are working as they should be.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.

Oct 20, 20:56 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 20, 20:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/10/2023 20:28 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack LIM0301A04A are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers / Global Infrastructure] - 46E13

Resolved - Start time : 19/10/2023 21:21UTC

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 46F29 / 46F30
entry.content:
Oct 19, 18:42 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/10/2023 16:11 UTC
End time : 19/10/2023 18:35 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to an issue on cooling system.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 19, 18:05 UTC
Update - Update : The servers in the 46F30 rack are available again. Our teams are still working on repairing the servers still impacted on the 46F29 rack.

Oct 19, 16:41 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Oct 19, 16:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/10/2023 16:11 UTC
Service impact : Somes servers in racks 46F29 / 46F30 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - LIM0301A04A
entry.content:
Oct 19, 15:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/10/2023 14:17 UTC
End Time : 19/10/2023 14:43 UTC
Service impacted : Servers on the LIM0301A04A racks were unavailable.
Root cause : The incident was caused by a circuit breaker trip.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
